name: Meeting Anna
description:
Hey all!

A couple of months ago I posted an essay called My Katawa Shoujo Manifesto at https://www.somewhere-far.com through which I founded a community to create visual novels. Things are going well, and we now have a short demo of our first project!

The game is a BxG dreamlike romance that takes place in Japan and begins at a university.

Keen to hear any feedback and hopefully meet some people who are interested in joining the project.

Our Discord server: https://discord.gg/FHGCsrp3

Arcadia
